languages.text: {n}Беспорядочный шторм из молитв и хаотически исполняемых ритуалов почитания не думает утихать. Паскаль, обратившийся в статую в оке этого урагана, и не пытается взять его под контроль.{/n}
{n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this maelstrom, makes no attempt to bring it under control.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Беспорядочный шторм из молитв и хаотически исполняемых ритуалов почитания не думает утихать. Паскаль, обратившийся в статую в оке этого урагана, и не пытается взять его под контроль.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this whirlwind, makes no attempt to rein it in.{/n}
{n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this whirlwind, makes no attempt to rein it in.{/n}
{n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this maelstrom, makes no attempt to bring it under control.{/n}
{n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this maelstrom, makes no attempt to bring it under control.{/n}
{n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this maelstrom, makes no attempt to bring it under control.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der hektische Sturm von Gebeten und planlosen Ritualen geht weiter. Pasqal steht weiterhin wie eine Statue im Auge dieses Mahlstroms und unternimmt keinen Versuch, ihn unter Kontrolle zu bringen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this maelstrom, makes no attempt to bring it under control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der hektische Sturm von Gebeten und planlosen Ritualen geht weiter. Pasqal steht weiterhin wie eine Statue im Auge dieses Mahlstroms und unternimmt keinen Versuch, ihn unter Kontrolle zu bringen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tempête frénétique de prières et de rituels désorganisés continue de faire rage. Pasqal, immobile comme une statue dans l'œil de ce cyclone, ne fait rien pour tenter de ramener le calme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this maelstrom, makes no attempt to bring it under control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tempête frénétique de prières et de rituels désorganisés continue de faire rage. Pasqal, immobile comme une statue dans l'œil de ce cyclone, ne fait rien pour tenter de ramener le calme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}混乱的祈祷与漫不经心的仪式仿佛狂热的风暴一样肆虐着，但帕斯卡仍然像一座雕像一样，站在漩涡的中心，完全没有打算进行干涉。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this maelstrom, makes no attempt to bring it under control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}混乱的祈祷与漫不经心的仪式仿佛狂热的风暴一样肆虐着，但帕斯卡仍然像一座雕像一样，站在漩涡的中心，完全没有打算进行干涉。{/n}

languages.text: {n}祈祷の狂乱の嵐とまとまりのない儀式の勢いが増す。渦中の中心に居るパスカルはいまだ彫刻のように動かず、騒ぎを収めようとする素振りもない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this maelstrom, makes no attempt to bring it under control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}祈祷の狂乱の嵐とまとまりのない儀式の勢いが増す。渦中の中心に居るパスカルはいまだ彫刻のように動かず、騒ぎを収めようとする素振りもない。{/n}
{n}祈祷の狂乱の嵐とまとまりのない儀式の勢いが増す。渦中の中心に居るパスカルはいまだ彫刻のように動かず、騒ぎを収めようとする素振りもない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La caótica sucesión de oraciones y rituales inconexos continúa. Pasqal, inmóvil como una estatua en medio de este torbellino, no intenta frenarla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this maelstrom, makes no attempt to bring it under control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La caótica sucesión de oraciones y rituales inconexos continúa. Pasqal, inmóvil como una estatua en medio de este torbellino, no intenta frenarla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dualarla ve gelişigüzel ayinlerle dolu azgın fırtına, almış başını gidiyor. Pasqal ise bu girdabın tam ortasında dikilen bir heykel gibi, durumu kontrol altına almak için hiçbir girişimde bulunmuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hectic storm of prayers and haphazard rituals rages on. Pasqal, still as a statue in the eye of this maelstrom, makes no attempt to bring it under control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dualarla ve gelişigüzel ayinlerle dolu hengâme, büyümeye devam ediyor. Pasqal ise bu girdabın tam ortasında duran bir heykel gibi durumu kontrol altına almak için herhangi bir girişimde bulunmuyor.{/n}
